name: Dino Safari
description:
Explore a free range dinosaur park featuring 4 different species of dinosaur and their offspring.  The park also has a waterfall and semi-active volcano.  Go around tagging each dinosaur as you see them, for points.  Also collect Dino Tokens for points and a chance to ride a dinosaur!

This game is aimed at children, aged five and up.  It's non violent, easy to pick up, and even a tad educational.

Currently working on more levels and an added story for the adeventure.
